item.title: Assistant Legal Attaché definition
item.description: In English: assistant legal attaché. In French: attaché juridique-adjoint. In Chinese: 法律参事助理.

item.title: Attaché juridique-adjoint définition
item.description: En français: attaché juridique-adjoint. En anglais: assistant legal attaché. En chinois: 法律参事助理.

item.title: Legal Attaché definition
item.description: In English: legal attaché. In French: attaché juridique. In Chinese: 法律参事.

item.title: Whistleblower definition
item.description: Whistleblower. The Office of the Whistleblower of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (S.E.C.) defines a whistleblower as “a person who voluntarily provides the SEC with original information about a possible violation of the federal securities laws that has occurred, is ongoing, or is about to occur.” Furthermore, the person, i.e. the whistleblower, “[is] not required to be an employee of the company to submit information about that company.” Source: (Official website of the S.E.C. at SEC.

item.title: Public document definition
item.description: Public document. A document issued or published by a political body or otherwise connected with public business. Black’s Law Dictionary (11th ed. 2019).
